key_title: Key to the subspecies of Philotheca angustifolius

source.author: Bayly, M.J.
source.title: Eriostemon
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Bayly, M.J. (1999). Eriostemon. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves c. terete, 2–10 mm long, under 1 mm wide, upper surface with a medial furrow, lower surface rounded; petals minutely pilose within
Leaves obovate, c. 4 mm long, 2 mm wide, flat or slightly concave, c. fleshy, upper surface smooth, lower surface prominently glandular; petals glabrous (or glabrescent) within
